category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Populate_FSC_Server_Targets
preference.preference_description: Based on the preference value the exporting site decides to populate the files to the specific file server cache (FSC) specified by the URL. Multi-Site features use a default populate target FSC ID for populating files that can be overridden by this preference. The exporting site interrogates the importing site for the this preference. Valid Values: A character string representing the FSCID, for example:FSC_tri6w035_nox
